description:
FREE FOR A VERY LIMITED TIME. DOWNLOAD NOW!
*****
Over 30 million users love to use InstaCollage! Join InstaCollage now!
*****

Tell the world your story via amazing looking photo frames and unique 2D&3D collages with caption in seconds! 

InstaCollage helps you quickly combine multiple sized photos into one beautifully framed picture & unique collage with caption  in seconds, then share your masterpiece to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and Flickr.

* NEW CONTENTS PER WEEK 
- New Unique 2D&3D collages per week 
- New Beautiful Photo frames per week 
- New Cute & Cool stickers per week 
- Bright up your photos with endless unique 2D&3D collages
- Bright up your photos with endless beautiful photo frames
- Bright up your photos with endless Cute & Cool stickers

* COMBINE YOUR PHOTOS TO UNIQUE COLLAGE
- 30  amazing irregular collage layouts.Unique! 
- 54  adjustable regular collage layouts
- 43 beautiful pic borders
- 18 amazing photo effects to  apply individual photo
- Adjust border's color
- Explore your saved collages via built-in gallery
- Auto save your masterpiece to built-in gallery when tap "Save to Camera Roll"

* CAPTION & STYLE YOUR PIC & COLLAGE 
- Add texts, stickers very easily and quickly  
- 79  creative  fonts
- 115  amazing stickers(Emotion,Love,Text,Holiday,etc)
- Easy to change text color, size, font,background
- Easy to Move,resize and rotate the text 
- Shadow text 

* EDIT PIC & COLLAGE WITH PRO PHOTO EDITOR
- Edit photo via a built-in PRO photo editor 
- Zoom in grid to pan,pinch,rotate photo
- Pan, rotate or mirror each photo 
- Rounded corners on photos 
- Move photos between different grids by drag and drop 
- Double tap picture to show photo edit menu 
- Shadow each photo
- Shake to clear all photos,stickers,texts 

* SHARE ON SOCAIL NETWORKS 
- Instagram 
- Facebook, Twitter, Flickr, Email 
- Save to Camera Roll album

Any feedback,suggestion will be welcome. Please feel free to contact us at: click2mobile_dev@yahoo.com, or follow us on instagram: @instacollages
trackCensoredName: InstaCollage Pro - Pic Frame & Photo Collage & Caption Editor for Instagram FREE
trackName: InstaCollage Pro - Pic Frame & Photo Collage & Caption Editor for Instagram FREE
releaseNotes:
The new design of Instacollae for iOS 7 is here with a new look and feel plus great new features! 

- You can now get layouts,photo frames,sticker for FREE from our server automatically 
- Endless unique collage layouts to choose from 
- new unique collage layouts(2D&3D) per week 
- new amazing photo frames per week 
- new cute & cool stickers per week 
- support double-tap collage preview at home page to add it to favorite
- support double-tap collage preview at home page to remove it from favorites
- more easy to use 
- crash bug fix 

Thanks for you guys make instacollage to the world's most popular collage app! And invite you friends and family to play InstaCollage with endless unique collage ,photo frames, cute stickers.
